title: RMIT: Photonics is transforming tech as we know it, here’s how - India Education Diary
content: RMIT: Photonics is transforming tech as we know it, here’s how  India Education Diary
description: From developing an early screening tool for ovarian cancer to powering the world’s fastest internet, the science of light is transforming technology and could hold the key to a vibrant new era for …
